body:
Hey, I recently bought a new Minecraft account and I will not be using this one anymore so I think that it would be only fair if I could perhaps have my donator rank removed from this account and onto my new account.

My new account IGN: xImTully
I was thinking of buying Emerald but I won't unless I get my donator rank transfered so I dont have to pay the full $50. Thanks :)

title: New Minecraft Account, Rank Transfered?

replies.body: Maybe write an email at the support or via skype like all others do.
replies.body_tagged: Maybe write an email at the support or via skype like all others do.

replies.body: Just prove its your account and they will move the rank :)
replies.body_tagged: Just prove its your account and they will move the rank :)

replies.body: Yep. You can contact a Sr Mod+ over Skype or send an email to support@avicus.net.
replies.body_tagged: Yep. You can contact a Sr Mod+ over Skype or send an email to support@avicus.net.

replies.body: Send an email to support, or contact Sr Mod+ on Skype (as stated above).

replies.body: [Removed] In skype to contact the nicest Sr. Mod there is on the server :3
